Scripts.OnMouseDown: if self.Pushed and self.Icon then self.Pushed:SetTexCoord(self.Icon:GetTexCoord()) end

Scripts.OnKeyDown: --print(key) if (key == "ESCAPE" or key == "F5") and (not Narci_GearTexts:HasFocus()) then --ConsolePort "Back" KeyListener_OnEscapePressed(); end

Scripts.OnEnter: self.Icon:SetTexCoord(0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1); if not CameraZoomController_DraggingFrame:IsShown() then ShowButtonTooltip(self) end

Scripts.OnLeave: if self:IsMouseOver() then return end if not PhotoModeButton.IsOn then PhotoModeControllerBar:SetAlpha(0) end Narci_GearTexts:ClearFocus() Narci_GearTexts:HighlightText(0,0) UIFrameFadeOut(self:GetParent(), 0.2, self:GetParent():GetAlpha(), 0)

Scripts.OnTextChanged: local LetterNum = self:GetNumLetters() local w = math.max(LetterNum*10, 180) --self:GetParent().BlackRight:SetWidth(w)

Scripts.OnLoad: self.tooltipHeadline = "Name Your Set -PH" self.tooltipLineOpen = "Left-click to modify this text."
Scripts.OnTextChanged: SmartFontType(self) local LetterNum = self:GetNumLetters() local w = math.max(LetterNum*16, 180) self:GetParent().BlackRight:SetWidth(w)

Scripts.OnEnter: if self:GetParent():GetAlpha() ~= 1 then return; end if self:IsEnabled() then SetCursor("Interface/CURSOR/Cast.blp") end
Scripts.OnTextChanged: SmartFontType(self) local LetterNum = self:GetNumLetters() local w = math.max(LetterNum*16, 160) self:SetWidth(w);
